Package io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.database.credentials

Class SqlSourceInit

java.lang.Object
io.curiositycore.thecuriositycore.database.credentials.SqlSourceInit
public abstract class SqlSourceInit extends Object
Utility class used to initialise the datasource for a SQL database. Doing so by grabbing connection credentials from a designated configuration file for the plugin.

    • getNewDataSource

      public com.mysql.cj.jdbc.MysqlDataSource getNewDataSource(org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration configurationFile) throws SQLException
      Get a new data source from a specified configuration file.
      Parameters:
      configurationFile - The configuration file containing the credential data.
      Returns:
      The data source of the requested database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception that throws if a connection is not successfully made.

    • dataSourceCanConnect

      protected boolean dataSourceCanConnect(com.mysql.cj.jdbc.MysqlDataSource dataSourceToTest)
      Checks to see if a data source can connect to its relevant database.
      Parameters:
      dataSourceToTest - The datasource to check.
      Returns:
      True if the datasource can be utilized to connect successfully, false if it cannot.
